wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
> I think the various proponents are arguing over unimportant syntactical > details when the semantics are basically the same.
That was my point when I regurgitated some SOAP history a while back (http://appside.blogspot.com/2007/09/rest-by-way-of-soap.html).
If you avoid the optional stuff and use good URI practices Doc-Lit is pretty much REST.
